mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_menu_base.select */ SELECT menu_no /* menu_no 메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */ ,uppr_menu_no /* uppr_menu_no 상위_메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */ ,menu_url /* menu_url 메뉴_URL character varying(200) */ ,menu_nm /* menu_nm 메뉴_명 character varying(100) */ ,menu_desc /* menu_desc 메뉴_설명 character varying(1000) */ ,icon_info /* icon_info 아이콘_정보 character varying(40) */ ,use_yn /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tc_menu_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND menu_no = #{menuNo} /* menu_no 메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_menu_base.insert */ INSERT INTO tc_menu_base ( menu_no /* menu_no 메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */
,uppr_menu_no /* uppr_menu_no 상위_메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */
,menu_url /* menu_url 메뉴_URL character varying(200) */
,menu_nm /* menu_nm 메뉴_명 character varying(100) */
,menu_desc /* menu_desc 메뉴_설명 character varying(1000) */
,icon_info /* icon_info 아이콘_정보 character varying(40) */
,use_yn /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{menuNo} /* menu_no 메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */
,#{upprMenuNo} /* uppr_menu_no 상위_메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */
,#{menuUrl} /* menu_url 메뉴_URL character varying(200) */
,#{menuNm} /* menu_nm 메뉴_명 character varying(100) */
,#{menuDesc} /* menu_desc 메뉴_설명 character varying(1000) */
,#{iconInfo} /* icon_info 아이콘_정보 character varying(40) */
,#{useYn} /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_menu_base.update */ UPDATE tc_menu_base
,uppr_menu_no = #{upprMenuNo} /* uppr_menu_no 상위_메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */
,menu_url = #{menuUrl} /* menu_url 메뉴_URL character varying(200) */
,menu_nm = #{menuNm} /* menu_nm 메뉴_명 character varying(100) */
,menu_desc = #{menuDesc} /* menu_desc 메뉴_설명 character varying(1000) */
,icon_info = #{iconInfo} /* icon_info 아이콘_정보 character varying(40) */
,use_yn = #{useYn} /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND menu_no = #{menuNo} /* menu_no 메뉴_번호 character varying(200) */
